授業の概要・背景: This is a high-level course. Therefore, it is advisable for students to have already taken similar high-level courses. Learners will be required to read and listen to native-level English language news and critically analyze the language within. Please be prepared to work hard and make valuable contributions to the class with high-level input.
授業方法:
All classes are expected to be conducted on campus, face-to-face style unless explicitly specified by the teacher. Google Classroom will be used for course information and assignment submissions. Therefore, students will NEED access to a computer at home or use a school computer lab to be able to properly complete and submit assignments. Desktop, laptop, notebook, Macbook, etc, are fine. Students should also have a Google account and sign up for Google Drive and Google Classroom (both are free).
This course is communication-based and requires interactive English-only communication with classmates every lesson.

------
This is an all-English classroom. Students can expect to communicate with the teacher and other students in English only. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.

Additionally, this class is taught communicatively and the class functions as a community in which all members support each other. This means that students can expect to interact regularly through pair work or small groups to review course content and/or will have consistent interaction with the teacher.
